title: email in use?
body: So I had an old account that got punished (chat restricted) and now hextech crafting and looting is perma locked from that account after 1 punishment (which i think is rather severe) so I am trying to make a new account since I don't mind starting over but I changed the email linked to the other account so I could use my main email on the new account but after i verified the changed email and went to make a new account, it still says that email is in use...?

replies.body:
You'll have to use another email, then change the email to the one you actively use *after* the account has been created.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Riot isn't going to help you evade punishment through creating another account.

> [{quoted}](name=Gengar,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pZKQ94YP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-02T03:33:14.321+0000)
>
> Riot isn't going to help you evade punishment through creating another account.

The punishment will be evaded regardless however and that point is moot.  I just don't feel like creating a new email entirely for the account for simplicity's sake
